pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560ti
  • Sound Card: Which can play sounds
